issue.title: [Python][Flight] Add Python documentation / tutorial for Flight
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6390](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6390). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no Sphinx documentation for using Flight from Python. I have found that writing documentation is an effective way to uncover usability problems – I would suggest we write comprehensive documentation for using Flight from Python as a way to refine the public Python API
